questions.text: Regularly sharing meals with people (eating together, not just parallel) is ...

answers.4: common — eating together is normal for me
answers.5: central — shared meals are how I connect

questions.text: People who would help with practical needs (and vice versa) are ...

answers.5: a network — we show up for each other
answers.2: maybe one or two — in emergencies
answers.3: some — I could ask a few people

questions.text: Letting people into my home and daily life (not just curated versions) is ...

answers.5: normal — my life is accessible to friends
answers.2: selective — only when things are presentable
answers.3: moderate — some people see the real version
answers.1: rare — people don't see how I live

questions.text: Helping others with practical physical needs (showing up when there's work) is ...

answers.4: regular — I make time to help
answers.5: consistent — I'm someone people can count on
answers.3: moderate — I help when I can

questions.text: Physical/practical friendships involving actual presence (not just digital) is ...

answers.4: common — I have regular physical presence
answers.5: primary — in-person is how I connect
answers.3: moderate — a mix of digital and physical
